name: IdleStonks
description:
Welcome to StonkIdle. 

In this Stock-Market-Simulator you can invest your money in different Business and try to get as much revenue as possible. 

This game is still in Development and was a side project during my vacation. Not everything is polished there are a lot of Design/Grammar/Spelling errors.  I wanted to share this with others who like the same kind of idle games.

Tipp to start: 

  1.  Invest your money into the stocks
  2.  Use your revenue from your interest to go to school (First learn the Shop)
  3. Try to get more Interest periods so your interest income don't stop. 
  4. Get Rich

Please give your feedback for new features, changes, balancing.
